title: JPMorgan Developing A Blockchain-Based Deposit Token For Payments
description: The token would act as a transferable digital currency, representing a deposit claim against it.

title: CFTC Cracks Down on 3 Defi Platforms for Offering Illegal Derivatives
description: The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) has issued orders against the operators of three decentralized finance (defi) protocols. The regulator accused them of committing various violations of commodity laws including illegal trading of digital asset derivatives. U.S. Commodities Regulator Settles Charges Against Defi Protocols Opyn, Zeroex, Deridex The CFTC has taken action regarding three […]

title: This is why Ted Cruz is bullish on Bitcoin
description: Ted Cruz, the US Senator, isn’t just hedging his bets on the cryptocurrency wave. He’s riding it full throttle. While many politicians globally are sidestepping or outwardly dismissing the crypto-mania, Cruz is showcasing his bullish enthusiasm for Bitcoin, particularly for its synergy with the Texan spirit of freedom. But it’s not just a passion. Cruz’s ... Read more
